hero.name: Mostafa Essa
hero.title: Senior Backend Developer
hero.description: I build scalable APIs and web applications using Laravel and Node.js. Passionate about creating robust, high-performance backend systems that power modern web and mobile applications.

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Get to know me better
about.description1: I'm a passionate backend developer with over 2 years of experience building scalable web applications and APIs. I specialize in PHP/Laravel and Node.js development, with expertise in database optimization, microservices architecture, and RESTful API design.
about.description2: My journey in software development started with a curiosity about how web applications work behind the scenes. Today, I've successfully delivered 7+ production applications serving thousands of users, with a focus on performance, security, and maintainable code.

gravity.title: Senior Backend Developer (PHP - Laravel)
achievements: Led development of 7 production applications serving 50,000+ users
Reduced API response time by 40% through database query optimization
Implemented robust authentication systems with JWT tokens
Mentored 2 junior developers in Laravel best practices

incode.title: Backend Developer
achievements: Created comprehensive API documentation reducing integration time by 50%
Implemented scalable architecture supporting 10,000+ concurrent users

yallaweb.title: Junior Backend Developer
achievements: Enhanced control panel functionality improving admin efficiency by 30%
Fixed critical bugs reducing system downtime by 80%
Improved CMS features resulting in 25% faster content management
